mapper.select: select VEND_CD, VEND_NM, BIZNO, TELNO from VEND where VEND_NM like '%${vendNm}%' and VEND_CD like '%${vendCd}%'
select RSC_CD, RSC_NM, MNG_UNIT from RSC where RSC_NM like '%${rscNm}%' and RSC_CD like '%${rscCd}%'
select 'RMI' || to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') || lpad(NVL(max(substr(rsc_insp_cd, 12, 3)), 0) + 1, 3, '0') from rsc_insp_dtl where substr(rsc_insp_cd, 4, 8) = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
mapper.insert: insert into RSC_INSP_DTL (RSC_CD, RSC_INSP_CD, ORDR_CD, INSP_CNT, INSP_PASS_CNT, INSP_FAIL_CNT, PRE_IST_CNT) values (#{rscCd}, #{rscInspCd}, #{ordrCd}, #{inspCnt}, #{inspPassCnt}, #{inspFailCnt}, #{preIstCnt})
insert into RSC_INSP (RSC_INSP_CD, INSP_DT, INSP_TSTR) values (#{rscInspCd}, #{inspDt}, #{inspTstr})
mapper.select: select ri.INSP_DT, vend.VEND_NM, count(*) inspCnt, ri.RSC_INSP_CD from RSC_INSP ri, RSC_INSP_DTL rid, RSC_ORDR ro, VEND where ri.RSC_INSP_CD = rid.RSC_INSP_CD and rid.ORDR_CD = ro.ORDR_CD and ro.VEND_CD = vend.VEND_CD and ri.INSP_DT >= #{startDt} and ri.INSP_DT <= #{endDt} group by INSP_DT, ri.RSC_INSP_CD, VEND_NM

select rid.RSC_CD, rid.ORDR_CD, rsc.RSC_NM, rid.PRE_IST_CNT, rod.RMN_CNT, rid.INSP_CNT, rid.INSP_PASS_CNT, rid.INSP_FAIL_CNT, rod.ORDR_CNT from RSC_INSP_DTL rid, RSC_ORDR_DTL rod, RSC where rid.ORDR_CD = rod.ORDR_CD and rid.RSC_CD = rod.RSC_CD and rsc.RSC_CD = rid.RSC_CD and rid.BOOL != 1 and rid.RSC_INSP_CD = #{rscInspCd}
